english: Welsh Government and Local Authorities' Combined Budgets
welsh: Cyfun gyllideb Llywodraeth Cymru a'r Awdurdodau Lleol

english: Hello and Welcome to Bangor University's Tax return App. You are able to view the previous years tax return breakdown as well as apply certain tax filters to see a potential breakdown for the next tax years return. MORE INTRO INFO ADDED HERE.
welsh: Croeso i Ap Ffurflen Dreth Prifysgol Bangor. Yma gallwch weld dadansoddiad eich ffurflen dreth y flwyddyn flaenorol yn ogystal â chymhwyso hidlwyr treth penodol i weld dadansoddiad posibl ar gyfer ffurflen dreth y flwyddyn nesaf. MWY O WYBODAETH RHAGARWEINIOL YMA.

english: Income tax is paid by employers to the gov via employee salary. Some information about the block grant
welsh: Mae treth incwm yn cael ei thalu gan gyflogwyr i'r llywodraeth trwy gyflog yr weithwyr. Rhai gwybodaeth am y grant bloc.

english: Income Tax Distribution per Salary Band
welsh: Dosbarthiad Treth Incwm yn ôl Bandau Cyflog

english: Local taxes incluide Non Domestic Rates (NDR) tax, Council Tax and  proposed tourism Levy.
welsh: Trethi lleol yn cynnwys treth Rates Non-Domestic (NDR), Treth y Cyngor, a'r treth dwristiaeth a gynhelir.

english: Select system for local tax filters and calculations
welsh: Dewiswch system ar gyfer hidlwyr a chyfrifon treth leol
